item.title: My first made it in 5 mins lol :P
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

[quote=“Scartastic, post:6, topic:150057”][quote author=Black pk link=topic=205528.msg1810110#msg1810110 date=1191821193]
Not rly my first i wanna hear wut u say [shadow=red,left]DON"T FLAME![/shadow]

[code]// Runescape auto talker by black pk

const
color = ‘white:’; // color
effect = ‘shake:’; // effect
talk = ‘’; // message

Procedure Signature;
begin
Writeln(’/////////// Auto Talker By: Black Pk \\\\\’);
Writeln(’ ppppppppppp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp pp kkk’);
Writeln(’ pppppppppp kkk’);
Writeln(’ pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp kk kk’);
Writeln(’ pp kk kk’);
end;

Procedure Time; //} u got 5 secs
begin
Writeln(‘Starts in 5 secs.’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘4’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘3’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘2’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(‘1’);
wait(1000)
Writeln(’~Starting~’);
end;

procedure talking;
begin
wait(1000)
SendKeys(color+effect+talk)
Keydown(13);
sleep(1);
Keyup(13);
end;

begin
Signature;
Time;
repeat
talking;
wait(2500);
until(false)
end.
[/code]
ENJOY!
[/quote]
Take the DONT FLAME away. We wont flame… I mean, its your first script, nothing to flame.[/quote]

Uhhh dude if U ont know why he but DONT FLAME dont say to take it down. He clearly states that this isnt his first script!

Read full topic
